summary: Tested Module A3: Creator Pattern Insights. Backend: 21/21 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI tests passed. Feature gating works correctly - Pro/Premium/Elite have access, Free/Starter see upgrade prompt.

minor.issue: Elite user subscription had plan_id='elite_monthly' which doesn't exist in SUBSCRIPTION_PLANS. Fixed by updating to plan_id='elite'.

passed_tests: GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Free user sees access_denied=true, tier=free
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Starter user sees access_denied=true, tier=starter
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Pro user has access (access_denied=false), tier=pro
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Premium user has access, tier=premium
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Elite user has access, tier=elite
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Returns correct structure (patterns, summary, tier, access_denied)
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Limit parameter works correctly
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-insights - Requires authentication (401 without token)
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-recommendations - Returns correct structure (recommendations, access_denied)
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-recommendations - Free user sees access_denied=true
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-trends - Returns correct structure (trends, period_days, access_denied)
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-trends - Days parameter works (period_days=60)
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-trends - Starter user sees access_denied=true
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-detail/{pattern_id} - Non-existent pattern returns 404
GET /api/creators/me/pattern-detail/{pattern_id} - Requires authentication
POST /api/creators/me/pattern-feedback - Requires pattern_id (400 without)
POST /api/creators/me/pattern-feedback - Saves feedback successfully (returns success=true, feedback_id)
POST /api/creators/me/pattern-feedback - Negative feedback (is_helpful=false) works
POST /api/creators/me/pattern-feedback - Requires authentication
Pattern categories are valid (success, risk, timing, growth, engagement, platform, content)
All tier users can login successfully
Frontend: Free user sees upgrade prompt with 'Upgrade to Pro' button
Frontend: Starter user sees upgrade prompt with 'Upgrade to Pro' button
Frontend: Pro user sees Pattern Insights component with PRO badge
Frontend: Pro user sees summary stats (Total Patterns, High Confidence, Categories, Actions)
Frontend: Pro user sees Patterns and Recommendations tabs
Frontend: Pro user sees Refresh button
Frontend: Elite user sees Pattern Insights component with ELITE badge
Frontend: Recommendations tab shows 'No actionable recommendations' message
Frontend: Refresh button updates 'Last updated' timestamp
Frontend: 'Upgrade to Pro' button navigates to /creator/subscription page
critical_code_review_comments: creator_pattern_insights_service.py - Well-structured service with proper feature gating via has_access() method
Feature gating correctly checks tier in ['pro', 'premium', 'elite'] for access
Pattern categories defined: success, risk, timing, growth, engagement, platform, content
Patterns are dynamically generated from proposals, projects, and ARRIS usage data
Test users have 0 patterns because they have no proposals - this is expected behavior
CreatorPatternInsights.js - Clean React component with proper data-testid attributes
Upgrade prompt shows feature preview cards (Success Patterns, Risk Detection, Timing Insights, Recommendations)
seed_data_creation: Fixed elite subscription plan_id from 'elite_monthly' to 'elite' in MongoDB
context_for_next_testing_agent: Module A3 Creator Pattern Insights fully tested. Key points: 1) Feature gated to Pro+ tiers (Pro, Premium, Elite have access). 2) Free and Starter users see upgrade prompt with 'Upgrade to Pro' button. 3) Patterns are generated dynamically from creator's proposals, projects, and ARRIS usage - test users have 0 patterns because they have no proposals. 4) All 5 endpoints tested: pattern-insights, pattern-recommendations, pattern-trends, pattern-detail/{id}, pattern-feedback. 5) Frontend component at /app/frontend/src/components/CreatorPatternInsights.js with proper data-testid attributes. 6) Tab is visible in Creator Dashboard at data-testid='tab-pattern-insights'.

mocked_apis.note: Patterns are generated from database analysis - no mocked APIs
